attributes.action: Place a post box in the centre of padstow
attributes.background:
Since the closing of the old post office in padstow we have nowhere except the spar shop, which is ok I guess while the shop is open. After that there is nowhere in the town centre to post your mail.
An ideal location would be near the bandstand
